predicate.note: Frames file for 'compete' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class correspond-36.1, no other members have been framed.

roleset.name: compete, vie

example.name: with opponent
example.text: The spinoff also will compete with International Business Machines Corp. and Japan's Big Three -- Hitachi Ltd., NEC Corp. and Fujitsu Ltd.
example.arg: International Business Machines Corp. and Japan's Big Three -- Hitachi Ltd., NEC Corp. and Fujitsu Ltd.

example.name: with prize
example.text: John competed with Mary for the last piece of cake.

roleset.note: Do not tag (but do not change existing tagging on) adjectival usages like "a competing offer".
